column1: Uchi////I traveled to many places around the US
column2: Uchi easily took number 1 sushi restaurant on my list.  First it blew my mind that I heard such good things about this restaurant in TEXAS.  C'mon
column5: that alone questions a lot of things.  However
column6: I was in the area for the F1 race
column7: hoping to see Sebastion Vettel....let me say that again
column8: hopeful wishing.  We sat at the sushi bar
column9: where me and my friend can converse with the sushi chef.
